title: Divine Moves
description: A cheating husband. A meddling mother. A handsome sheriff. Meryl Howe’s neat and tidy life just got very messy.After finding her husband in bed with the neighbor, Meryl thinks her life has hit rock bottom. Until her mother, who she hasn't seen in 17 years, blows in from Vegas. With a past that includes stripping and five weddings, Faye knows all about holy (and unholy) matrimony. Faye is on a mission to save Meryl’s marriage and open an exotic dance studio in Meryl’s conservative hometown. But Meryl has other ideas. She's falling for a handsome sheriff even though he’s accusing her of crimes she didn’t commit. Mostly.While her mother somehow talks Meryl's book club into promoting the new business by stripping at a charity tea, Meryl must decide between her husband and Officer McHottie.But first she has to get through Christmas.Divine Moves is a wild and funny look at marriage and the potholes on the road to happily ever after.
author: Ellyn Oaksmith
